ygData.subject: Gaming setup
ygData.msgSnippet: So I m kind of starting LAN parties around my small town and I ve been looking at different keyboard/mouse combinations. I ve really been leaning torward a
ygData.messageBody:
So I'm kind of starting LAN parties around my small town and I've been looking at different keyboard/mouse combinations. I've really been leaning torward a keyboard with a built in trackball/pad simply for ease of portability and use when playing. I've also seen the Nostromo SpeedPad N52 and have been wondering about it as well. I was wondering if anyone has tried this with EQ and how well it works or what is your setup? Have any of you tried that Zboard? It has a setup for EQ and EQ2 among other games out there.

Thanks!

Nostromo SpeedPad: http://www.thinkgeek.com/computing/input/gaming/68a2/
Zboard: http://www.zboard.com/us/products/products_main.htm

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<->>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
This is where i would say something profound that may
help end world hunger or solve global conflict. However
I can't come up with anything other than "I've got gas".
